name: UC Health Precision Medicine Laboratory
description: At UC Health, we not only lead the region in breakthroughs, we embrace a spirit of purpose – allowing us to offer our patients and their families something that surpasses traditional healthcare providers. At UC Health, we offer hope.

name: Cleveland Clinic
description: Cleveland Clinic is one of the largest and most respected hospitals in the country. Our mission is to provide better care of the sick, investigation into their problems, and further education of those who serve.

name: University Hospital
description: University Hospitals is one of the nation’s leading health care systems, providing patient-centered care that meets the highest standards for quality and patient safety and have received numerous awards and recognitions from some of the most prestigious institutions in the country for our leadership and exceptional patient outcomes.
